Text: Petition for Declaratory ReliefDOC Cc Declaratory ReliefDOC Attached please find the latest version of the petition We have added two paragraphs on the confidentiality provision although I think we are leaning toward excluding that claim It appears based on the interviews and documents I have gathered that the confidentiality clause was put in the documents by Enron I have also left the sentence on acceleration of payments bracketed I was not sure whether we had reached a final decision as to its inclusion Finally we appear to be one Guaranty agreement short We are missing a copy of the East Coast Power Guaranty I will call Lisa about it this morning Petition for Declaratory ReliefDOC
